thread.section_title: Savannah, Coastal Georgia and Lowcountry News and Weather - WJCL News
thread.title: Pleasant weather to start 2024 with lots of sunshine
thread.title_full: Pleasant weather to start 2024 with lots of sunshine

author: Jonathan Myers
title: Pleasant weather to start 2024 with lots of sunshine
text:
Hearst Owned Mainly sunny for New Year’s Day Advertisement Savannah, Ga. (WJCL)- New Year’s Day will be pleasant with temperatures a few degrees above the 62˚ average. There will be lots of sunshine with highs in the low to mid-60s. A cold front will bring the area a few clouds by the evening. Have a good start to New Year!
Hearst Owned Cool weather by Tuesday Temperatures are going to be much cooler behind the cold front. There will be lots of sunshine on Tuesday with highs near 10˚ below average. Temperatures will be in the mid-50s for highs.
Hearst Owned Showers likely by Wednesday night Most of this week will be dry, but there is a good chance for rain Wednesday night into early Thursday morning. Highs for the week will be below average in the 50s.
Hearst Owned Wet weather for Saturday A low pressure-system will impact the weather this weekend. The low will give Coastal Georgia and Lowcountry a good chance for rain on Saturday. It could be soaking rain on Saturday with most areas picking up near one inch. The dry weather will return by Sunday.
Hearst Owned Cool weather throughout the week Forecast:
New Year’s Day: Mainly Sunny. High: 62-64.
Tonight: Mostly Clear and Chilly. Low: 36.
Tuesday: Sunny and Cooler. High: 54.
Wednesday: Morning Sun then Mostly Cloudy. Showers Possible After 4 PM. High: 58.
Thursday: Morning Showers Then Clearing Skies. High: 56.
Friday: Sunny and Cool. High: 56.
Saturday: Cloudy with Showers. High: 66.
Sunday: Mix of Sun and Clouds. High: 58.
Sun and Tides:
Sunrise: 7:24 am Sunset: 5:30 pm
High: 11:30 am (6.4’) Low: 5:45 pm (0.8’)
Have a good day,
Jonathan Myers
